test.create_query: CREATE TABLE test_date(date String) ENGINE = Memory;
test.fill_query: INSERT INTO test_date SELECT 'NULL' FROM numbers(1000000);
test.query: SELECT parseDateTimeInJodaSyntaxOrZero(date, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', 'Asia/Shanghai') FROM test_date SETTINGS max_threads=10 format Null;
SELECT parseDateTimeInJodaSyntaxOrNull(date, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', 'Asia/Shanghai') FROM test_date SETTINGS max_threads=10 format Null;
SELECT parseDateTimeOrZero(date, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', 'Asia/Shanghai') FROM test_date SETTINGS max_threads=10 format Null;
SELECT parseDateTimeOrNull(date, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss', 'Asia/Shanghai') FROM test_date SETTINGS max_threads=10 format Null;
